https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lKkjPQBvtZb30ZIAVJEpuvJpg4f.jpg Riku, the heir to a corporate conglomerate, is determined to go through life never owing anything to anyone on principle. However, one day he nearly drowns in a river and is saved by a homeless girl named Nino. To repay his debt, he begins living together with her on the banks of the river as her lover. Arakawa Under the Bridge
